Ten ideas to make me hate myself for writing a blog less

07 Nov 2017

I will not lose this bet. If it comes down to it, I will write on this blog every day for the rest of my life, and simply outlive my opponent. But so far, writing his had few positive effects, and largely made me feel like a pretentious dick, so I may as well lock up some emotional EV as well as $EV.


  1. Shamelessly steal the 10x format and just write every post like that
  2. Try and actually make it interesting to other people rather than just writing about whatever is on my mind
  3. Making it completely vapid rather than trying to be deep
  4. Try harder
  5. Aggressively phone it in every day
  6. Make the blog more like a legitimate journal
  7. Only blog about poker
  8. Only blog about chess
  9. Only blog about/in Spanish
  10. Any combination of the above
